Class LibrarySearch

java.lang.Object
  LibrarySearch

public class LibrarySearch
extends java.lang.Object

Library searching class. This class performs menu choice #2 "Search". It takes the user input and searches both book and journal arraylists for a match. If all fields are left blank it prints the entire library.

Method Detail

setCallNumber

public void setCallNumber(Library lib)
Method sets the call number for query. This Method sets the call number of the book/journal to be searched for. This field can be left empty and is not required.

setTitle

public void setTitle(Library lib)
Method sets the title for query. This Method sets the title of the book/journal to be searched for. This field can be left empty and is not required.

setYear

public void setYear(Library lib)
Method sets the year range for query. This Method sets the year range of the book/journal to be searched for. This field can be left empty and is not required. Year range must be in the form 'XXXX-XXXX' without quotes where XXXX represents a 4 digit number between 1000-9999. If 'XXXX-' is entered it returns all years XXXX and greater and if '-XXXX' is entered it returns all years XXXX and less between 1000-9999.

searchBook

public void searchBook(Library lib)
Method searches book arraylist. This Method searches the book arraylist for a match of the search parameters. If a match is found it is printed to the screen.

searchJournal

public void searchJournal(Library lib)
Method searches journal arraylist. This Method searches the journal arraylist for a match of the search parameters. If a match is found it is printed to the screen.
